divs: Sighting DetailsWell to begin It was me and family and friends over at my house for the 4th.Then when some others were watching the fireworks from all over i hear my cousin go what the hell is that. When i looked up there were 4 glowing amber colored ojects fly in the sky with some distance in between them.We all seen it and people were like its helicopters but they were way to high for that, i thought they were planes at first but they werent flashing and were very bright.My uncle was saying it could be missles but obvoulsy we would have heard bout that sometime after.They just flew North i belive following each other, They seem to be very high in the sky, and how i lost sight of them because of the trees and line of sight as they kept going, but one did look like it went more up than the others and just disappeared. If anyone else has seen hopefully some pictures will surface, my mother did take picturres but they did not come out very well and she erased them.
Summary: 4 unknown objects fly through NW Indiana.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Highland
There were no other sightings in Highland on or around July 4th 2009
